main event: Mr. William Thompson observed a bright, glowing light in the sky above his residence in Hamburg, New York on the evening of June 6, 1966.
interesting points: Mr. Thompson saw the object for several minutes,The object hovered silently before moving rapidly straight up,Thompson stated it did not resemble any conventional aircraft,No physical evidence was found to corroborate the sighting,The weather conditions at the time were clear with no cloud cover.
sighted object: a bright, glowing light in the sky
